captions.text:
Good evening! Happy New year!
Good evening!

Ah! Good evening. Happy New Year! 
Wish you all the best!
Sonia, get down. Or you may fall.

You'll see them with 
the curtains like that.
Get down, my Dandelion. I'm not upset.
We have a New Year to celebrate...
The New Year is at hand.
What is it? Don't cry, please.
It was a strange New Year celebration.

It is why, perhaps, 
that I've remembered it so good.
We waited aunt Valia and uncle Igor,

ambulance doctor and 
mother's friend, to visit us.

But it turned out some 
aunt Valia's relatives
from Vladikavkaz had come to visit her

and uncle Igor called Mom 
and said strange thing about his

trick with an alleged 
duty hadn't worked out.

Mom went to the bathroom to cry 
in order not to hurt her child.

Then we started celebrating 
the New Year together.
I'll see him tonight, for sure.

You know, Dandelion, he comes 
when no one sees him...

You told me it's possible when 
one is eager to, didn't you?...

Mom would often say there 
is some kind of curse on out family.

All women from the Koukourovsry 
lineage give birth to girls only.

Such ones as me -- pale 
and not good-looking at all.

This was the case with 
my Grandma, and Mom.

And I, when I grow up, will give 
birth to a girl to raise her alone.

But no miracle happened that night, and I 
resolved to be the last one in our lineage.
The one to ruin the curse.

(Ad announcer): "RUSSIAN WAYS offers you 
best audio, video and home appliances..."

Based on the novel "THE DANCE OF 
WHITE DANDELIONS" by TATYANA TURINSKAYA

TV sets  and video cameras are 
at sale today with 10% discount..."

(Ad announcer): "...We are glad 
to see you at our mall."

(Ad announcer): "...You'll find 132 
branded shops in our galleries,...

...two ice skating rinks, a 5 showroom movie 
theater for 2,000 viewers,..."

Music by NIKITA MOISEYEV
Good morning!

(Ad announcer): "... a bowling 
alley with a bar,..."

... an entertainment spot for children, 
billiards, 8 restaurants..."

Excuse me, please! I'm sorry. 
Good morning!

Hey, miss! Take the ball please!
I'm married.
Are you hurt? You sure? Go ahead.
Hi! Sasha resembles you so much.
And Gera, probably, his mother, doesn't he?

It's okay. She and I parted. 
And now we have a boy band.
How can that be? I'm so sorry.
Well... You home address is the same?
А couple of hours is enough?

Sonia, call me if whatever happens. 
I'll be in my studio.
Hey, out there! Watch your steps!
What shall I do with you?

Just look around: there are 
so many pretty girls out there.

That's it. ANTEY is done. 
Dad, I don't want Cinderellas.

I don't do charitable work. 
I'm a businessman.
And how long will it take?

Have no idea. Look there: 
this cake of soap's here too.

Well, I believe we'll be off in 
some fifteen minutes, will we?

Ladies and gentlemen! 
The City Hall represented by...
Is very glad to greet you at our Annual...

We invited all people having 
concern in our city.
So to say, the city's brain!

A scout camp indeed!
Don't be a nuisance.
So, we've decided that it is high time

to award  two special prizes 
at out annual celebration!

Ladies and gentlemen! They are 
"Hope" and "Reliance" of our city.

But today we are going to have 
a pleasant surprise with "Hope".

So, the honor to be titled 
"Reliance of Our City"

Thank you! Thank you!
-- Here, take it. -- Oh, may I?

We planned that the "Hope" 
and "Reliance" of our city will meet

to stand together here 
at our stage, as two atlantes.

So, ladies and gentlemen, the honor 
to be titled "Hope of Our City"

Thank you! Congratulations! 
Thank you very much!

will shake each other's hands 
as friends! It's for the press.

We see "Hope" actually prevented 
"Reliance" from falling down!
Ah! That's a real handshake now!

will support each other in unforeseen 
situations by mutual backing!

And our party keeps on! And now, meet 
again charming ladies at our runway!

Ah, yes! By the way, meet Semion Lvovich; 
Semion, it's my son Rodion!

Dad, let's get out of here!
Let's go.

Good idea. Dislike everyone around gaping 
at me. But I'll find my daughter first.
Yes. A marriageable girl, by the way.

Let's  go, perhaps, 
she's out there. Come on.

"And he woke up in the morning and 
understood his dream had become true:
he became a real boy." That's the way.

I've missed you so much, Mommy!
We've just finished with the fairytale.
Do you? Tell "good bye" to Sonia.

I'll be waiting for you. Good bye.
Come on, let's go. See you later.
Just an ordinary. It's only 2 carats in it.

Look, it's just that the next year... 
it will be a leap one.
It's very bad for marriage and business.

Heaps of children will come to my wedding 
party -- it's right in your line.

Look, don't get offended: 
I'd love to, but I cannot come.
Let's see what we have... Aha.

This hair of yours... Have you ever tried 
to conk it? Stand up. On the heels.
Oh! That's another pair of shoes!
Well... Can you tell on what's your fiance?
Not with me, of course -- with his business.

You see, our marriage is the design 
of my Dad: a kind of a business merger.
if you have money, you'll get love.

Mom, I asked you not to 
touch anything, didn't I?

And I asked you to quit fiddling with 
these papers and grow up, didn't I?...

Okay, let's call a spade a spade: these 
are not papers but your infantilism.
This is your personal escape from reality!
And THIS is your reality! Do you like it?

"A Curse of Koukourovsky Lineage" or a blockbuster 
"Fatherlessness" -- coming soon in all theaters!
Put the Grandma's picture on its place.

I won't! I don't want 
to live like you do, Mom!
I don't want to be abandoned.

It's better to have no husband 
at all, than... like this...

I've never regretted 
about giving birth to you.
I was invited to a wedding party.

(Ad announcer): "The shop of natural 
cosmetics for body and face treatment located...

(Ad announcer): "...at the fourth floor 
of our mall offers you beauty

aids designed based on natural oils, herbs, 
extracts from natural fruit and plants..."
"I love to hear her speak, yet well I know
"That music hath a far more pleasing sound:
"I grant I never saw a goddess go,

"My mistress, when she walks, 
treads on the ground..."

(Ad announcer): "... You are 
welcome with your kids."

Yeah? What flowers? Ah! Then 
buy them if you need to...

Please, help with your donations to children orphans! 
Hey, mister! Help with your donations...

I'm not shouting.
Help with your donations!...
I'm not shouting; it's the way I talk, Dad.
Okay, give it to me. Take off your hands.

It's not to you. I'm not saying 
this to you. I'll call you back.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
What do you mean by "here you go"? Hey,
Don't shout. They'll launch it in a minute.
"Come in, come in, good mister..." Hey!!

Goose! Are they sleeping out there 
or what? Hey, anyone!!
It broke because of your negative emotions.
I don't feel like climbing to floor 12.

What's it with you? Eh? 
Need something, do you? Hey!! Wait!
Hold on, mister! Here put your head on it.
Breathe. Breathe: in -- out, in -- out. What?

It's odd: you're a businessman 
and you afraid of some elevator.
They're too slow to fix it.
When is it going to get fixed?
Roger. The repairer is on his way.

Okay. What do you think 
it is if not claustrophobia?
Eh? Let's be on close terms. Hear me?
You, mister... You are afraid of everything.

You trust to no one. All obey you and, 
probably, are afraid of you -- I'm not sure...

And here we have nothing 
but an elevator. Scary, isn't it?

I think it's depressing 
not to trust to anyone.

You've analyzed me. 
So, let's talk about you.
You... think you're the only in your kind.

The best. You think you're 
above all worldly things --

above urge for success,
money and well-being.

An angel indeed! But your life 
is as narrow as this elevator.
A small box stuffed with fairytales.
Eh? And who is to be afraid?
When a kid I was romantic too.

My friend and I dreamed 
of leaving for the North Pole.

We broke up our piggybanks, 
bought tickets and left.

No. My dad took me off the train 
and explained the things very clearly.

And Alex left, and now he works 
at a weather station. Fool.

Why fool? Imagine, 
this door opens right now --
Void and only you, real you.
So, what shall I do out there, so real one?

There's nobody to scare of 
and nobody to frighten.

I think that's the reason for people 
going to the mountains.

That's okay. Why shivering? 
Don't be afraid. That's it, we go.
A plot of land, 9,504 m2 of total area,

leased under a lease contract 
for the term of 49 years.

The plot is rectangular, oriented 
in parallel to the Peace Avenue.

Landscape plain, the territory 
is enclosed with a concrete fence.

Construction of blocks o flats is under way 
around it -- in immediate environment...
Don't you really need an escort?

Have you tried to burn 
through paper with your look?
Can't we just pass it by?
We can. But we cannot leave the jam.

Just a second. Larie! 
-- Yeah? -- Where's Rodie?
I'll be back in a minute.
And which part are you on?
Well... I, in fact, was forced to come.
Eh... Did you want me to stay?
It's eloquent. I need to go.
To be frank, I hate weddings.
Then there will be two of us who hate them.
Groom, put on the ring, please.
And you, bride, put oh the ring, please.

Ladies and gentlemen! 
By the authority vested in me
by "The Law of Marriage and Families".

I now declare about mutual 
consent of Miss Larissa Zeldova

and Mr. Rodion Andrianov 
to become wife and husband.

Dear Larissa and Rodion, 
your marriage is declared registered!
I now pronounce you husband and wife.
Groom, you may kiss your bride.

Dear Larissa and Rodion, 
you're husband and wife from now on.

From now on, you will forever 
be responsible for the one
who entrusted his/her life and love to you.

And, as a sign of love and concord, 
take your wedding glasses, please.

The first swallow means joy, 
the second swallow means happiness,
and the third swallow means love!

And now, ladies and gentlemen, 
it's high time for a kiss!
Now a kiss! Now a kiss!
Now a kiss! Now a kiss! Now a kiss!...
And my Dad's got a Maserati!

Young ladies dislike 
being treated like that.

He's got an idle land plot, 
50 hectares. In a good district.
Nikitin can help with the subcontractors.
Let's talk of it later, will we?
I forwarded an offer from Dad to you.

What?! You're having 
a honeymoon, aren't you?
Wait... Wait a second... That's it. It's Pasha.
About the estimate. I have to answer.

Miss, you considered 
a Pasternak edition in there.
Buy it from me. I'll sell it cheaper.

Oh, thank you. My Mom's looking for his works. 
Look here. A Pasternak is on the offer.

Oh, no!
If you don't like it...
You can take it for free.

Well done! Everyone! Now go to search 
the lost treasure! Forward! Hurry up!

What? Want to have a baby?
What?

Hi, Koukourovskaya! Nice costume! 
Okay, go to your work.

It's Sonia, remember her? 
She was invited to our wedding party.

Sonia. Here. Take the bags. 
Watch out, Bear! It's expensive!
Now, everyone shows me the gathered jewels!

I have found an elephant!
What a beautiful elephant!
And I have found a money tree!
My God! Why are you dawdling?

And now you may keep 
all you've found! -- Hurrah!
What are you gaping at them?
Look. A luxurious portrait might be!

- You're just flattering me.
- Not in the least!
Switch the channel, Mom, will you?
I too want... to have a bit of celebration.

Then have it, I don't mind. 
But a bit quieter.

- A visitor to see you?
- No...
It was left at the door.
I do have them, in contrast to some ladies.
Are you saying I don't have them? Eh, Mom?

THIS is what you wanted to say, 
didn't you? All right!
Oh, no. It's okay. Come in.
What a surprise! Let me help you.

I wanted to phone first, 
but then decided not to.
Don't take off your boots. Come in.
She's beautiful. How do you make it?
We just make it. It's three of us, right?

Oh no. No, I'm not. It's okay. 
You just should have called me before.

It's my ex. We just haven't 
changed the flat yet.

Look, wait for a while 
in this room, will you? Please.
Just wait a bit. That's right. It's okay.
Dad, it's so freezing out there!

- Come in, boys. It's so warm in here. Take 
off your jackets. - Mom, I can't do it that fast!
Good boy. Give it to me.

- And we have a guest.
- Really?

Yes. Irie, meet Sonia, 
a kid animator from the mall.

She brought presents 
for us as regular customers.
Nice to meet you. Thank you for your job.
You know, I should be going.
Sonia, stay with us! Stay please!
Should you? You can stay with us for dinner.
Sonia, will you play with me?

- No, not now, darling. I should go now. 
What good boys!... - It's pity!
See you. Mom, can I go with Sonia?
We'll ask Dad about the presents.

So, we've got four months 
to get all things done. Will you cope?

We'll do that. I'll look through 
your project again tonight.

I've checked two or three land plots, 
so one of them, I believe...

Don't worry. We've already 
seen them: they are perfect.

Together with your father-in-law. 
That's what we need!
Good! Dad will be glad to know.

We need to talk in private, 
will you excuse us? Come on.

Look, you didn't see the 
plot did you? You didn't.
Dad has perfect 50 hectares out there.

Hectares! Don't you understand I haven't checked 
this land, do you? Why the hell you come in?

You know how's this called? A "set up"! 
And who did it? My own wife!
Wife? Oh, come on! I've forgotten!

So, we are having a romantic
dinner tonight, aren't we?..
A threesome one! You, me and your laptop!

And you've made good 
friends with my credit cards!

Yes, I have! It's only pity they 
cannot be used to pay for... love!

I never knew that Bear with so much 
of capacity has so little potency! It's!...

What are you waiting for! 
Go run to your dad.

Have do doubt I will. I will come 
to you house never again!
Go and fiddle with your laptop! Weakling!
Good evening, miss. Are you unwell?
No, I'm not unwell. I'm terribly unwell!
Well, well, well... Sophia. An artist.
Hey! Who's gonna pay? -- It's okay...
Careful! I make no trouble to anyone!
Hey, mister! Wait a minute! -- What?

Hey! Wait! He's with me! 
Excuse him, please!

He's drunk a little too much! 
Things happen, you know...
Okay, take him away out here!
And what are you doing here?
And what am I doing here?

Why are you rushing about? 
You'd better sit instead.

- Senia...
- Why are you standing here? Why?!
Go check whether she's awake now! Go!

It's time you go. Your wife's 
going to worry about you.
But I can finish my tea, may I?
I would have died without you yesterday.

By the way, I have never 
saved anyone in my life.

Just tried once and it was 
enough for the rest of my life.

When I was a kid. On a river. 
The Kozinka, know it?
Well. I was some 12 then and...

My parents and I went for the 
riverside for the weekend...

many people from town 
used to come there. Yes...
Well, I made an acquaintance with a girl...
So, we were swimming and having fun...
Then I was distracted and turned away...
But when I turned back -- she was gone...

I dived to find her; 
I was calling for help...

Some of adults jumped in... 
searching for her too.

But when she was taken to the surface, 
she... didn't breathe already.

I rushed to her, but my dad grabbed me 
with both arms and pushed into the car.
I was crying for weeks then, blaming Dad.
Zina, off you go. Off with you.

Personally I view this wedding with 
Rodion to have been a great mistake.

If Boria hadn't left, -- if you 
hadn't sent him away then...

The water's getting gold. 
Okay, Dad, just go.

To hell with your Boria! 
Boria! Boria! Boria!

It's him! He himself decided 
to leave for the UK!

To have a study course! 
To hell! Hear me?! Damn him!

- Dad! He's no longer my husband!
- But I definitely know he's still my son-in-law!
How in pledge? All the company?
Now you got it? Call him!
Are you a little boy? You're a businessman.
It can't be found it now.
Let us go for a walk?
Don't know. Just out. Come on.
It's not a season for the summer house.
No one owes anything to anyone.

- Hallo? Rodion, is that you?
- No, it's not him.

What Prokhor Petrovich? 
Call Rodion! Hallo?! Hallo?!

- This corner goes here...
- Let me help you.
No. I'll do it on my own.

Yes, he did... He left and 
abandoned everything.
We wrote to him, and called him...
No, no. That's it. It's time.
No, I don't want to! That's it. That's it.

Yes, that's it. Leaving. 
I'm leaving. That's it.
Okay. I'll be back like the wind.
Wake up everyone! Life's full of wonders!
No, ma'am, it's not. Good afternoon!
What are you waiting for? Come in.

I'll explain everything. 
Don't do that to me.
Just don't ever do that, Dad.

What is this, eh? 
Called my parents to help?
I was scared at home alone.
I'll go and seat -- I may not...
This means "no". All right. Then I leave.

I've looked through the papers. 
The plot is perfect.
You can sign them without a doubt.

Can I do things on my own, eh? 
Without any advice?

Really? Well, if you're 
so fully fledged now,

then I may hope my grandson 
will have a father, can I?

I was searching you, but you disappeared. 
It's 5 weeks already.

I cannot come tonight, you know... 
I'm snowed under with work....
Will be in the office all evening long...
I'll call you when I'm free.
Here you go. Sign here and here.

Congratulations, gentlemen! Rodion, will 
you allow me play the master for a while?

Rodion Aleksandrovish, here. 
It's just been delivered.

So, Koukourovskaya, 
you can congratulate us.
Rodia and I will become parents soon.

I'm very happy for you. 
How will you name the baby?...

Well, it's too early 
to think about the name.

A man found it near your house. 
Isn't it yours?

And the husband is not yours! 
He's mine, got it?!

- Good afternoon! Come in! Welcome.
- Thank you.

- You're a real dandy.
- Thank you. This is for you.

You shouldn't have... Thank you. 
These are Lara's favorite ones.

Come on, make yourself comfortable.
I'll find a vase for the flowers.

Sonia! What?! Sonia what's it with you?! 
Sonia, what are you doing?!

Come here! Calm, calm down! 
Quick! Quick! My God!
O my God! You're silly little thing.

My little foolish girl. Calm down... 
It's all right....
Got out of the game, mom. Got out.

I think they should live at 
our place for the first month.

Oh, let them not, you know. Let them live 
independently. Long nights, lots of concerns...

- They help in becoming closer.
- What helps in becoming closer?

- Look, let's come in. I've got chilled.
- Let's come.

Here we are! Hi everyone! 
So, what's the situation?
Rodie is sad. He got cut to bits.

You didn't want to leave. 
You were forced, weren't you?

I was. You've been 
wasting no time while I was off.
You've got married and waiting a baby.

How "no baby"? Are you crazy? 
Wait. Wait. I cannot do it like that.
There's your father in the next room.

By George, Lara, why 
is it so complex with you?

I'll live with the husband, 
and the baby will be yours.

You're insane! Why?... 
Why have you married him?
All we have is in pledge. All of it!

The company,  the house, 
the property... Everything!

- What are you talking about?
- My Dad's bankrupt!
I need this child! Help me, please!

You know, I lost so much in the game, 
just like you.
I know it. I love you, Dad.
Rodie, what is it with you?
You need to just live on.

Stiffen with cold? Stand up. 
Come on. Now try on this.

You'll wear this. It's not Moscow, you know, 
such stuff is out of fashion here. Come on.

Get warmed. Get warmed. 
You of all people! An office worm indeed.

So, some tea? Or a bit 
of a stronger beverage?

What shall we do now? 
Jesus! What shall we do now?
Senie, life's coming to ruins... Jesus!

Tell me, miss. How do I find Sonia 
from the children's ground?...
Sonia? See that girl? It's her.
Come here! Wait, where are you going?
Here. He's come to see you. Talk to him.
She's as hard as a rock.

She was crying long hours. 
Every night. I've remembered it.
I made a mistake then. I hurt her badly.
I'm not blaming you. It's our karma.
All women from the Koukourovsky lineage...
No, Sonia, no! I didn't abandon you.
It was you who drove off Dad?

All our family skeletons were taken 
out of all cupboards that night.

My Granddad met some 
other woman after the War ended...

Grandma never married again, 
but she forgave Granddad. Mom didn't.

It was then that she invented this 
"curse of the Koukourovsky lineage"

about only girls are being born in our family 
and all of them growing up without fathers.
She was about 30 when she met my father.
And in a year I was born.
After that my parents quarreled often.

Mom watched his every step, 
being terribly jealous.

And one day she just packed the stuff, 
took me in her arms and left.

Well, excuse me, Sonia. 
I'm unable to go any further.
Come on in. Why are you standing there?
Take it off, take off the coat.
On the river, when a kid.
Okay, come on... take it off.
I thought you'd want to know...

I'll leave now. I'll...take some 
rest and leave...
I was missing you so badly...

That's it. Come on... Take all 
of this off. Come in!

I was the last woman 
of the Koukourovsky lineage.
I broke the curse that never existed.
And in a month I delivered a son.
That's the end of the story.

title: Одуванчик / The Dandelion. Фильм. StarMedia. Фильмы о Любви. Мелодрама. 2011

comments.text:
Одуванчик / The Dandelion. Фильм. StarMedia. Филь…: 
https://youtu.be/_1dPPWmTk7o﻿
comments.author: conja son

comments.text:
Такая добрая, наивная, зимняя история)) всё очень чисто и прекрасно))
Отличная концовка, настоящая сказка))

И напоминание родителям, как просто сломать порой жизнь ребёнку, вешая на 
него свои проблемы и обиды. Эта история с проклятьем гипертрофированный 
показатель того, каких только сказок не выдумают взрослые, чтобы скрыть 
истинное положение вещей. Нежелание идти навстречу человеку рядом, понять 
его, услышать, породило эту нелепую сказку, рассказанную бабушкой, столько 
раз повторённую, что убедила маму, которая просто решила даже не стараться 
выйти из кокона, смирившись с "предначертанным". И более того, сама стала 
настаивать на "проклятии", не осознавая, что ломает жизнь ребёнку...
Все эти папы-разведчики и космонавты - это всё оттуда же...﻿
comments.author: Саша Сашина

comments.text:
В жизни и не такое бывает, просто мы об этом не знаем. Не все дороги к 
счастью прямые. Как мало пройдено дорог, как много сделано ошибок. Фильм 
хороший. Не следует смотреть тому, кто не любит мелодрамы. Мы все разные.﻿
comments.author: Нина Калинюк

comments.text: Ну почему нам всегда нравятся фильмы про золушку?﻿
comments.author: Elena Vagina

comments.text:
Слишком добрый, слишком хороший фильм. Вообще слишком, любителям сериалов и 
мыльных опер то, что надо. К реальности не имеет никакого отношения. А нас 
растят всю жизнь в сказках.
Целевая аудитория 12+﻿
comments.author: Роман

comments.text: Мне 41 я бы тоже поехала если бы любила ﻿
comments.author: Анна Кольцова

comments.text:
I like the story, but do not understand the meaning/(Indonesia) aku suka 
ceritanya, tapi gak ngerti artinya ﻿
comments.author: revo laosan

comments.text:
Да уж, я попробую не согласиться со всеми восторженными отзывами. Смотрели 
с мужем-американцем 12 стульев с Гомиашвили, т.к. все остальные шедевры 
советского кинематографа пересмотрели, этот фильм был в рекомендованном - с 
субтитрами. Муж мужественно досмотрел до 50 минут (я тоже) - дальше стало 
невыносимо. Очень наивный фильм, сюжет прост как 2 пальца, после шедевров 
Гайдая и тд смотрится очень плохо и скучно. Печально, ведь актеры-то 
примелькавшиеся и известные. Ну раз людям нравится - это самое главное. 
Выразила лишь свое мнение, по мне так фильм - нескобюджетная ерунда, каких 
много. Не кидайте тапками :) всем хороших фильмов и приятного просмотра!﻿
comments.author: Valentina Dubé

comments.text:
Замечательный фильм, очень милый для семейного просмотра!))
Ксюша.﻿

comments.author: Наталья Ерохина

comments.text:
В последний вечер лета стоит посмотреть что-то особо позитивное и 
умиротворяющее. Поэтому предлагаем сегодня провести вечер с картиной 
"Одуванчик".

О фильме: Перед вами история запретной любви! Две высокопоставленные семьи 
хотят поженить своих отпрысков Родиона и Лару. Однако накануне свадьбы 
жених застрял в лифте с малопривлекательной барышней Соней, которая при 
этом помогла ему преодолеть приступ клаустрофобии.
Каково было удивление молодого, когда он вновь встретился с «одуванчиком» 
на собственном свадебном банкете: Лара пригласила Соню, свою одноклассницу, 
в качестве аниматора. Судьба предоставляет Соне и Родиону возможность 
сделать выбор между страстью, долгом и будущим благополучием. 

Смотреть: Одуванчик / The Dandelion. Фильм. StarMedia. Мелодрама. 2011﻿
comments.author: Star Media

comments.text:
Второй раз с удовольствием смотрю,ибо как моя сестра за милым поехала в
